scoringPlays.text: Mike Williams 34 Yd pass from Deshaun Watson (Greg Huegel Kick)
Mike Williams 19 Yd pass from Deshaun Watson (Greg Huegel Kick)
Jordan Leggett 11 Yd pass from Deshaun Watson (Greg Huegel Kick)
Wayne Gallman 8 Yd Run (Greg Huegel Kick)
Mike Williams 16 Yd pass from Deshaun Watson (Greg Huegel Kick)
C.J. Fuller 18 Yd pass from Deshaun Watson (Greg Huegel Kick)
Bryan Edwards 33 Yd pass from Deebo Samuel (Elliott Fry Kick)
Artavis Scott 3 Yd pass from Deshaun Watson (Greg Huegel Kick)
Kelly Bryant 1 Yd Run (Greg Huegel Kick)

videos.description: Early in the first quarter, Clemson kicker Greg Huegel has his 39-yard field goal attempt blocked by South Carolina's Ulric Jones.
videos.headline: South Carolina blocks early Clemson field goal attempt

videos.description: Jake Bentley pass intercepted Jadar Johnson return for no gain to the SCaro 47
videos.headline: J. Bentley pass intercepted by J. Johnson

videos.description: Clemson's Deshaun Watson floats the ball deep to Mike Williams who leaps in the air to make a 34-yard touchdown grab in the first quarter against South Carolina.
videos.headline: Clemson's Williams makes incredible catch for early TD

videos.description: Clemson's Deshaun Watson throws it to Mike Williams who rolls off of multiple South Carolina tackles to score a 19-yard touchdown in the first quarter.
videos.headline: Clemson's Williams won't be denied second TD of game

videos.description: On fourth-and-5, South Carolina attempts a fake punt with Hayden Hurst running up the middle but is stopped with a 1-yard gain.
videos.headline: Clemson stops fake punt from South Carolina

videos.description: Deshaun Watson stays hot in the first quarter by finding Jordan Leggett for an 11-yard touchdown against South Carolina, extending the Tigers' lead to 21-0.
videos.headline: Watson finds Leggett for third TD strike of first quarter

videos.description: Deshaun Watson pass intercepted Bryson Allen-Williams return for no gain to the SCaro 11
videos.headline: D. Watson pass intercepted by B. Allen-Williams

videos.description: Clemson running back Wayne Gallman takes the toss left and hurdles past a South Carolina defender en route to an 8-yard touchdown, extending the Tigers' lead to 28-0 in the second quarter.
videos.headline: Gallman rushes past South Carolina D to extend Clemson lead

videos.description: Deshaun Watson throws a screen pass to Mike Williams who rumbles his way 16 yards for a touchdown. Its Williams' third TD of the first half, giving Clemson a 35-0 lead over South Carolina.
videos.headline: Watson and Williams connect for third TD in first half

videos.description: Clemson head coach Dabo Swinney pleased with team's performance in 1st half
videos.headline: Clemson head coach Dabo Swinney pleased with team's performance in 1st half

videos.description: Early in the third quarter, Deshaun Watson floats a deep ball to C.J. Fuller who makes the catch in the end zone for an 18-yard score, giving Clemson a 42-0 lead over South Carolina.
videos.headline: Watson makes it 5 TDs with pass to Fuller

videos.description: Deebo Samuel pass complete to Bryan Edwards for 33 yds for a TD
videos.headline: D. Samuel pass to B. Edwards for 33 yds for a TD

videos.description: Clemson quarterback Deshaun Watson is continuing his great night against South Carolina, this time by tossing this sixth touchdown pass, a 3-yard pass to Artavis Scott, in the third quarter to extend the Tigers' lead to 49-7.
videos.headline: Scott's grab makes it 6 TDs for Watson vs. South Carolina

videos.description: Kelly Bryant run for 1 yd for a TD
videos.headline: K. Bryant run for 1 yd for a TD

videos.description: Breaking down Clemson's 56-7 win over South Carolina
videos.headline: Breaking down Clemson's 56-7 win over South Carolina

videos.description: Deshaun Watson and Mike Williams connect on three touchdown passes as No. 4 Clemson beats South Carolina 56-7.
videos.headline: Watson and Williams lead Clemson past South Carolina

videos.description: The Gamecocks get on the board with a 33-yard halfback pass from Deebo Samuel to Bryan Edwards but the Tigers defeat South Carolina 56-7.
videos.headline: South Carolina falls to No. 4 Clemson
